properties.Comment: For maximum efficiency, please try to run this from start to finish.
I added in a couple of fail safes, if you are on the island and the quest is in progress
If you do encounter issues, please ping me @Kiwiszn in the PSC Discord
Areas and other variable settings, run once

children.customDisplayName: If not in Quest Giver Area

actions.customDisplayName: Speak to Captain tock at Rimmington docks
If we spoke to Captain Tock, we go to Corsair Cove

children.customDisplayName: Walk to Rimmington if not there
If we are in Rimmington docks

actions.customDisplayName: Speak to Ithoi the Navigator - Step 3

properties.Text: It be a curse upon us!
Am I not a picture of health

actions.customDisplayName: Speak to Arsen the Thief - Step 4

children.customDisplayName: If we are still at Ithoi
If back in Corsair Cove Area
If we are on Arsens 2nd floor
I hear you've been cursed alternative
I hear you've been cursed dialogue text

properties.Comment: Location or NPC check for redundancy

actions.customDisplayName: Speak to Captain Tock (Graps Tinder & Spade if not in inv)

children.customDisplayName: While Tinderbox in Inventory is False
If Tinderbox in Inventory, but no spade, proceed
If we are still in Gnoccis hut leave
If we are in the Cabin Boy hut
If we are in neither huts

actions.customDisplayName: Speak to Chief Tess in the Corsair Cove Dungeon

children.customDisplayName: If at Chief Tess in the dungeon

actions.customDisplayName: Dig by the lump of sand

children.customDisplayName: If we are on the hidden stash tile
If still in Ithois hut, leave
If we can see Arsen The thief
If in distance of Cabinboys hut stairs on first floor

actions.customDisplayName: Speaking to Arsen the Thief continuation until we speak to Cabin boy

children.customDisplayName: If we are in neither huts

actions.customDisplayName: Speak to Cabin Boy and Ithoi
Final Phase 4, speak to Ithoi again

properties.Text: We'll see what the Captain has to say about that.

actions.customDisplayName: Final Phase 5, time to kill Ithoi
